body.p:
Somerset Pulaski County
23d June 1862
To his Excellency B MaGoffin Govenor of Kentucky
I resign my office as Justice of the peace of District No 1 in Pulaski County to take affect on the 29th day of July 18 inst.

Very Respectfuly
Yours
E. D. Perch
Whose Duty is it to Give the writ of election of mine please Instruct me

-- yours respectfuly --
H- Gragg Judge of
the Pulaski Cty Court
